title: Linux whereis Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux whereis command and learn how to locate executable files, source code, and manual pages on your system. Customize the search behavior to suit your needs.

meta.title: Linux whereis Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux whereis command and learn how to locate executable files, source code, and manual pages on your system. Customize the search behavior to suit your needs.
meta.keywords: Linux, whereis, command, executable, source code, manual pages, file, directory, search

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of the whereis Command

verify.name: Verify the location of the 'ls' command
verify.hint: The 'whereis' command should return the location of the 'ls' command as '/usr/bin/ls'.

steps.title: Locate Executable Files, Source Code, and Manual Pages Using whereis

verify.name: Verify the location of the 'gcc' command
verify.hint: The 'whereis' command should return the location of the 'gcc' command as '/usr/bin/gcc'.

verify.name: Verify the location of the 'python3' command
verify.hint: The 'whereis' command should return the location of the 'python3' command as '/usr/bin/python3'.

steps.title: Customize the Search Behavior of the whereis Command

verify.name: Verify the binary location of 'gcc'
verify.hint: The 'whereis -b gcc' command should return the binary location of 'gcc' as '/usr/bin/gcc'.

verify.name: Verify the manual page location of 'python3'
verify.hint: The 'whereis -m python3' command should return the manual page location of 'python3' as '/usr/share/man/man1/python3.1.gz'.
